title: ICE in print::pprust with `-Z unstable-options --pretty normal`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Input: https://gist.github.com/whipsch/9053cc076083248b2c13

RUST_BACKTRACE:

```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', ../src/libcore/option.rs:366
```
